title: Custom Website Development
excerpt: Our website development services are dialed-in and fully customized to suit your needs and surpass your user’s expectations. From idea, to implementation and support, it's time to leverage our experience to build your web presence.

banner_image.alt: Friendly robot looking at a laptop

headings.content: We've been building websites for over two decades.
Our website development services are customized to suit your needs and surpass your user’s expectations.

texts.content: Whether you're a small business or a national brand, we develop custom websites that are efficient, secure, low-maintenance, and give users a unique, unforgettable experience.

items.title: SEO Optimized
items.description: Search Engine Optimization (SEO) is the process used to get your website to the top of Google and other search engine results when your prospective clients search for your services. 90% of people searching for a service never make it to the second page of results. You'll benefit greatly from a specialized local search engine optimization program. At Code Less Traveled, we provide the most effective and affordable SEO plans and expect to achieve first-page results.

items.title: Responsive & Efficient
items.description: We build websites with usability in mind. This means that when you partner with us to build your online web presence we deliver a product that looks equally great on a big screen or a cell phone.

items.title: Beautiful Design
items.description: Combining talent for graphic design with a belief that 'code is poetry' we consistently build great-looking websites. Each of our websites is designed and developed based on your design preferences. We start by asking you to send us a sample of a website or design that you like.  Once our initial design is developed, we show it to you and can make any requested changes.  Once the design is approved we move into the development stage.

items.title: Maintainable
items.description: Your website should work for you, not the other way around. Our websites are easy to maintain, even if you eventually choose another IT provider in the future.  We don't lock you into our system.

items.title: Mitech Management Systems
items.description: Our service offerings enhance customer experience throughout secure & highly functional end-to-end warranty management.

items.title: Reliable Multi-function Technology
items.description: Develop and propose product improvements through periodical and accurate testing, repairing & refining every version.

items.title: Highly Professional Staffs
items.description: Develop and propose product improvements through periodical and accurate testing, repairing & refining every version.

items.title: Infrastructure Integration Technology
items.description: At Mitech, we have a holistic and integrated approach towards core modernization to experience technological evolution.

headings.content: Assess your business potentials and find opportunities for bigger success
